entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E] On Debian only, SDK dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.6.23310.1-x64.deb installing failed with error: archive 'dotnet-sdk-x64.deb' uses unknown compression for member 'control.tar.zst' ling faile #16646

Updated

  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET8 RC2 SDK installed, Error "Failed to validate package signing" happens during installing workloads. #17320

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update README for VMR #17322

Updated

  • Add source build artifacts size tests #17233
    Area-SourceBuild
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Fix aspnetcore build on musl-libc platforms #17324
    Area-SourceBuild
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #17231
  • Skip BasicScenarioTests.cs and WebScenarioTests.cs for PublishComplex action #17313
    Area-SourceBuild
